Expired.value: Dear user,{##}{##}Your Coinbook license has expired.{##}Either you did not make the activation, or too late.{##}It can also be that the activation has not worked.{##}{##}You can re-enable Coinbook here.{##}{##}If you have any questions, please contact our support team.{##}{##}Please select your next action.

Wrong.value: Dear user,{##}{##}Unfortunately you did not have any Coinbook licenses for this computer.{##}{##}This can be due to the following reasons:{##}{##}1.You have changed Coinbook on a new PC or parts of your PC have been replaced.{##}2. You have Coinbook installed on a 2nd or 3rd computer.{##}3.The activation on your PC has not worked.{##}4.You are not in possession of a valid license for Coinbook.{##}{##}If you have any questions, please contact our support team.{##}{##}Please select your next action.

You have Coinbook installed on a 2nd or 3rd computer.{##}3.The activation on your PC has not worked.{##}4.You are not in possession of a valid license for Coinbook.{##}{##}If you have any questions, please contact our support team.{##}{##}Please select your next action.

Initial.value: Dear user,{##}{##}You have re-installed Coinbook. Now the program has only to be activated.{##}Activation is done by including the serial number of your PC in the license.{##}Unfortunately, these measures are necessary to prevent robbery.{##}{##}You can use Coinbook from the date of purchase 30 days without restrictions. Within these 30 days the activation must take place.{##}If it does not, the license becomes invalid, and then only our support can help you.{##}It is best to request the activation of Coinbook.{##}{##}If you have any questions, please contact our support team.{##}{##}Please select your next action.

lblAnzeige.value: Dear user{##}{##}Your license for Coinbook must be activated{##}{##}Please complete your address here, if necessary. Your e-mail address is especially important here.{##}{##}If you want to send the activation request now, click 'yes' otherwise click on 'no' {##}{##}Because the activation didn't take place until {0}, Then you can't continue working with Coinbook until the activation has been completed.{##}{##}You can of course also activate the request in the menu 'Options' the menu item 'Activate Coinbook'. The activation will then take place automatically within the next 2-3 working days{##}{##}. After the activation you can use Coinbook for an unlimited period of time.
